SELECT A.* ,DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DATE, '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') CREATE_DATE_STR ,U1.USER_NAME FROM REQUEST_LOG A LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U1 ON A.USER_ID = U1.USER_ID WHERE DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{FROM_DT} AND #{TO_DT}
AND UPPER(A.USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{SEARCH_STR}),'%')
AND UPPER(A.USER_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{SEARCH_STR}),'%')
ORDER BY A.CREATE_DATE DESC
